Why JCG

Our case for why we’re the best choice

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.1″ background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/why-jcg-header.jpg”][et_pb_code admin_label=”Empty Spacer” _builder_version=”4.1″][/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Text Centered – with Flag” _builder_version=”4.1″ background_color=”#F0F0F0″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”on” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Flag Row” _builder_version=”4.1″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”on”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/hero-flag.svg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.1″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.1″ custom_padding=”75px||75px||true|false” collapsed=”on”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.3.4″ text_line_height=”2.1em” header_2_font_size=”25px” header_2_line_height=”1.28em” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”780px” module_alignment=”center”]

We have what it takes

We’ve been in your shoes, and we know where the profession is headed. That’s the kind of vision and expertise you need to elevate your business to the next level. Here’s how we stand apart. 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Main Content” _builder_version=”4.1″ collapsed=”on” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Bullet Points” _builder_version=”4.1″ custom_padding=”||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.1″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Orange Bullets” module_class=”orange_arrows” _builder_version=”4.3.4″ link_font=”||||on||||” ul_font_size=”16px” ul_line_height=”1.7em” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||-45px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”0px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false”]

  • We care: Each one of our solutions was created with you, the funeral and cemetery business professional in mind. Our goal at JCG is to make your life easier, whether you are looking to grow your business, or transition to whatever is next, we want to create a positive and successful experience for you.
  • We are committed: We live and breathe the funeral and cemetery profession, and our valued clients are our first priority. We analyze the latest trends and developments within the funeral and cemetery space and continually deliver intelligent business solutions.
  • We will continue to create: As our profession changes, the needs of our clients change, too. That’s what motivates us to remain innovative. We strive to identify opportunities for improvement in every facet of the funeral and cemetery business, and to develop products and strategies that keep you well-ahead of the game.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Testimonial” _builder_version=”4.1″ background_color=”#F0F0F0″ collapsed=”on” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.1″ collapsed=”on”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/quote.svg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.1″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.1″ text_font=”Bitter||||||||” text_text_color=”#1e4a75″ text_font_size=”15px” text_line_height=”2.1em” header_2_font_size=”20px” header_3_font_size=”14px” text_orientation=”center”]

A word from our clients

I have known Tom and Jake Johnson for many years. We have used their services for accounting, acquisition analysis and financing, family surveys, and sales analysis for a long time and we relied upon them to help us sell our 132 year old family company. We also used them for strategic planning and found it very beneficial in operating 13 locations in competitive environments.

– Rick Allnut, Allnut Funeral Service

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”CTA with Background Image – Global” _builder_version=”4.1″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(30,74,117,0.92)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(30,74,117,0.92)” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/services-cta-bg.jpg” global_module=”286″ saved_tabs=”all” collapsed=”on” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.1″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/icon-conversation.svg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.1″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.1″ text_line_height=”2.1em” header_2_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” width=”780px” max_width=”90%” module_alignment=”center”]

Let’s start the conversation

With a clear understanding of where the profession has been, and a compelling vision of where it’s going, we help our clients reach new levels of success. Let’s talk about how we can do the same for you.
